channel.title: How Can I add NPC Drops To Dodian?
channel.description:
I know how to add drops to Hellzend, it envolves item.java and npchandler, but how do I add NPcdrops to dodian, because I did they same thing with Dodian as I did Hellzend, but in dodian, everytime you hit the monster it drops, instead of actually killing it.
Thanks, Play For Keeps
